channel.title: Paying For Client Help,
channel.description: Ok, so im editing sprites in my server's client. Now i got a bunch of sprites, already named and what not, but how do i add a brand new one that it didnt have? For example: My client has "hitMarks 0" which is the defence sprite, but no "hitMarks 1" which would be the attack sprite, but when i add the hitMarks 1, it doesnt put anything in the client. My guess is there is a file somewhere that tells the client to import "hitMarks 0" but i need to add "hitMarks 1"

item.title: Paying For Client Help,
item.dc:creator: @granshy4productions granshy4productions
item.description:
@granshy4productions wrote:

Adobe:

Wrong section, Post this in the client section: www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,138.0.html

Ok, will do, thanks

item.title: Paying For Client Help,
item.dc:creator: @granshy4productions granshy4productions
item.description:
@granshy4productions wrote:

Ok, so im editing sprites in my server’s client. Now i got a bunch of sprites, already named and what not, but how do i add a brand new one that it didnt have? For example: My client has “hitMarks 0” which is the defence sprite, but no “hitMarks 1” which would be the attack sprite, but when i add the hitMarks 1, it doesnt put anything in the client. My guess is there is a file somewhere that tells the client to import “hitMarks 0” but i need to add “hitMarks 1”

Read full topic
